duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct operational and data analysis activities related to client onboarding/transitions/conversions.
Prepare for and onboard clients, open and close accounts, and reconcile incoming or outgoing data for accurate translation to the platform.
Review the Account Opening Checklist for accuracy and conduct pre-transition/conversion testing and quality review of client data.
Assist in managing transitions/conversions by developing plans, assessing resource requirements, and coordinating with different departments.
Provide support for Transition Consulting, Relationship Management, and Account Management teams to ensure a seamless client experience.
Communicate progress to the team and escalate issues or potential project delays.
Provide project management to maintain and support less complex client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or the equivalent combination of education and experience required. Advanced/graduate degree preferred.
